name: home
title: Home Page
description: Breitling Home Page with Hero Section, Category Section, and more

files.content:
import { HeroSection } from "@/components/hero-section" import { CategorySection } from "@/components/category-section" import { PromotionalSection } from "@/components/promotional-section" import { LatestAdditionsCarousel } from "@/components/latest-additions-carousel" import { StrapSection } from "@/components/strap-section" import { BoutiqueSection } from "@/components/boutique-section" import { EBoutiqueServices } from "@/components/e-boutique-services" /** * Home page component for the Breitling website */ export default function Home() { return (
) }

import type React from "react" import Image from "next/image" import Link from "next/link" interface PromotionalItem { id: string image: string title: React.ReactNode subtitle?: string link: string } export function PromotionalSection() { const promotionalItems: PromotionalItem[] = [ { id: "fathers-day", image: "https://www.breitling.com/api/image-proxy/images.ctfassets.net/11yu5j5b14kx/5DbZkA9VHgocC66AXJWUvO/0df903c9181dd44eea02a4d1b80957f8/Fday_sb.jpg", title: ( <> HAPPY FATHER'S DAY! ), subtitle: "Find the best fit for your dad", link: "/watches/father-day", }, { id: "austin-butler", image: "https://www.breitling.com/api/image-proxy/images.ctfassets.net/11yu5j5b14kx/a9nezdtKQrw2HlAsWmXWR/6a033c330e174c74d773fcdfd0b04249/Navitimer_austin.jpg", title: ( <> AUSTIN BUTLER WEARS THE LEGENDARY NAVITIMER ), link: "/watches/austin-butler-navitimer", }, { id: "top-time-racing", image: "https://www.breitling.com/api/image-proxy/images.ctfassets.net/11yu5j5b14kx/TM8mVIDbiIYKNsUZOXpWh/87c8d95bfc564abbdcbd7b50361a7810/racing_sub_banner.jpg", title: ( <> TOP TIME RACING & MARTINI RACING ), subtitle: "Fueled by racing history, made for today", link: "/watches/top-time-racing", }, ] return (
{promotionalItems.map((item) => (

{item.title}

{item.subtitle &&

{item.subtitle}

} Discover
))}
) }

import Image from "next/image" import Link from "next/link" export function StrapSection() { return (

BREITLING STRAPS

Pursue excellence, embrace our strap collection through Breitling style.

) }

"use client" import Image from "next/image" import Link from "next/link" import { MapPin, Phone, ChevronRight } from "lucide-react" import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" interface Boutique { id: string name: string image: string address: string phone: string } export function BoutiqueSection() { const boutiques: Boutique[] = [ { id: "geneva", name: "BREITLING BOUTIQUE GENEVA", image: "https://www.breitling.com/api/image-proxy/a.mktgcdn.com/p/FAmR6aX4omChh6ewjSrSYf3qK49GIea6QVf1KseP8Tg/1280x755.jpg", address: "PLACE DES BERGUES 1 GENEVA", phone: "+41227381600", }, { id: "bern", name: "BREITLING BOUTIQUE BERN", image: "https://www.breitling.com/api/image-proxy/a.mktgcdn.com/p/XlkodE_RZDpVoTGr7Q-RqHDG4C8CmskyWGmYR_VHtJY/8256x5504.jpg", address: "1-3 MARKTGASS-PASSAGE BERN", phone: "+41763674293", }, { id: "interlaken", name: "BREITLING BOUTIQUE INTERLAKEN", image: "https://www.breitling.com/api/image-proxy/a.mktgcdn.com/p/oONKanX2i-43iPVCMTw40kfM6uE_qlnkvS_vQLz53dM/2000x1125.jpg", address: "37 HÃ–HEWEG INTERLAKEN", phone: "+41338267073", }, ] return (

BREITLING BOUTIQUE

{boutiques.map((boutique) => (

{boutique.name}

{boutique.address}

{boutique.phone}

Get Directions View More
))} {/* Find a Store Card */}

Visit us in a Breitling boutique or at official retailers and convince yourself of our high-quality products. Discover new models, get individual advice and find the Breitling watch that suits you best.

) }

export function EBoutiqueServices() { return (
